'''Elena Kukanova''' is a Russian artist<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.deviantart.com/ekukanova/about/|articlename=About EKukanova|website=[https://www.deviantart.com DeviantArt]}}</ref> most notable for her artworks inspired by the writings of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], particularly ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.

She was born in [[Wikipedia:Moscow|Moscow]] and educated professionally as an artist in [http://www.glazunov-academy.ru/ Russian Academy of Painting, Sculpture and Architecture] between [[1998]] and [[2004]].
